Text: Heh. Was handling Demonoid for the past few weeks :)

jackfrost?  Tempyst?  ZeroDaze?
This is going to bug me until I figure it out.

I've never uploaded on Demonoid, I stay quiet on that site.  The tracker scares me, even though I overseed.  It's like having a coco next to you when you're driving.  Even if you aren't speeding, you still get stressed.

Ah, yes.  Yeah, you've been pretty active over there lately.
But you obviously know what I mean about the ratio (Mister .49).  How is it possible for an uploader to have less than a 1-1 ratio?  It doesn't make sense, but everyone hates you for it.  Or maybe that's all in my head and I'm just insane.  That's possible too.

After uploading 342 torrents, you'd think my ratio would be atleast two. Last week, I uploaded over 30 GB of friends but Demonoid chose to ignore that.

And, then I download 2 GB of Stephanie Brown and Demonoid glady adds that to my ratio. That's how it's been like for over 6 months.

If, they'd actually calculated it correctly, my ratio should be somewhere around 3. But, it's a lost cause.
